name: Bron's Quest
storyline: Bron is a young man who dreams of becoming a hero and saving the world from the evil wizard Morock, who has been terrorizing the lands with his army of monsters. One day, he receives a mysterious letter from his long-lost uncle, who claims to have found a way to defeat Morock and invites him to his mansion. However, when Bron arrives, he discovers that his uncle is nowhere to be found, and that he has to deal with a bunch of eccentric guests, strange events, and sexy situations. Will Bron find his uncle and learn his secret? Will he be able to resist the temptations of the beautiful women he meets along the way? And what is Morock’s true plan? The fate of the world is in your hands!
summary: Bron’s Quest is an unfinished adult visual novel game developed by Marble Syrup. It follows the adventures of Bron, a young hero who is on a quest to save the world from an evil wizard named Morock. Along the way, he will meet various characters, explore different locations, and encounter sexual situations in a humorous dialogue that parodies classic RPG tropes. The game features a branching storyline, multiple endings, turn-based battles, and a public demo that was released in March 2018 for Windows, Mac, Linux, and Android. The development status of the game is uncertain, as there has been no update from the developer since then.
